opening: Lieutenant Zeron is a soldier of the Xervadon Empire, serving as a pilot in its space force for nearly 8 years. He is stationed on one of the Xervadon space stations, overseeing spaceship inspections with his unit when Colonel Margord approaches him.

dialogues.text: At ease, soldier! I have a mission for you.

The Vorroths have detected unknown signals from a small moon, but they cannot interpret them and have requested our help. Assemble a squad of five and fly to the moon to investigate. I will provide the ship and necessary equipment. Will you take the mission?
I knew I could count on you! Everything you need will be in the hangar in three days. Good luck!
< Lieutenant Zeron appoints soldiers from his unit to form the squad >
